input: Chronic stress leads to elevated cortisol levels. High cortisol inhibits the immune system, making the body more susceptible to infections.
gold_logic: '((INCREASES CHRONIC-STRESS CORTISOL) (INHIBITS CORTISOL IMMUNE-SYSTEM) (INCREASES CORTISOL INFECTION-SUSCEPTIBILITY) (IMPLIES (INCREASES CHRONIC-STRESS CORTISOL) (INHIBITS CHRONIC-STRESS IMMUNE-SYSTEM)))
reasoning: Chain: Stress -> Cortisol -> Immune Inhibition. Transitive property applied.

input: All men are mortal. Socrates is a man. Therefore, Socrates is mortal.
gold_logic: '((IS-A SOCRATES MAN) (HAS-PROPERTY MAN MORTAL) (IMPLIES (AND (IS-A ?X MAN) (HAS-PROPERTY MAN MORTAL)) (HAS-PROPERTY ?X MORTAL)) (HAS-PROPERTY SOCRATES MORTAL))
reasoning: Classic syllogism. Instantiation of universal rule.

input: Regular aerobic exercise improves cardiovascular health by strengthening the heart muscle and improving circulation.
gold_logic: '((IMPROVES AEROBIC-EXERCISE CARDIOVASCULAR-HEALTH) (STRENGTHENS AEROBIC-EXERCISE HEART-MUSCLE) (IMPROVES AEROBIC-EXERCISE CIRCULATION) (CAUSES (STRENGTHENS AEROBIC-EXERCISE HEART-MUSCLE) (IMPROVES AEROBIC-EXERCISE CARDIOVASCULAR-HEALTH)))
